name: THE SEGMENT TWINS
description:
The Segment World, Unique Tag Action
In The Segment World, Each stage has two backgrounds that coexist in a segmented form. Each background separates into the twin zones. You can do tag action through segments and use each style of attack.




The Mush Hunter Twins, "Matilda" and "Amanda"
These are twin girls who make a living by eradicating Mush. The twin girls have a "Sword Master" and "Gunslinger" attack style.


Stylish and Hit Satisfaction
The game is fast-paced in classic arcade format. You can feel a good hit satisfaction as the battle is the main one.


Toon Style Graphics
It features unique graphics that mimic Comics' feelings, including halftone and glitch effects.




Various Mush and Five Charming Bosses
Defeat various types of mush and defeat overwhelming bosses!
